1004450.name: Terroir: Official Soundtrack
1004450.description:
Terroir owes much of its atmosphere to the music. Composed, arranged and performed by Singapore clarinet group "CLARQuinet", the soundtrack is divided into 4 pieces, each corresponding to a season. It evokes the promise of Spring, the verve of Summer, the solemnity of Autumn and the barren beauty of Winter.

The tracks are in .WAV format (total size of all tracks is approximately 218 MB), and are available to download completely free.

Track Listing


  • Spring (5:00)
  • Summer (5:55)
  • Autumn (6:03)
  • Winter (3:35)

The Terroir soundtrack was composed by Ralph Emmanuel Lim, Jerry Tan and Mark Fillon; arranged by Ralph Emmanuel Lim and Jerry Tan; performed and record by CLARQuinet; and recording and mixed by Eric Wong.
